spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Spelling
spec_data.Description:
"Test::Spelling" lets you check the spelling of a POD file, and report
its results in standard "Test::Simple" fashion. This module requires the
hunspell program.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:15:10 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Check for spelling errors in POD files
